page.title: 13Aerial View
page.content: I am flying over Swansea. People are walking into the Telecom Tower like ants walking into a tall cardboard box. Swansea Castle is boarded up so you cannot go inside.Ladies are walking out of big stores, chatting and fussing about what they have bought; they look like ladybirds in their smart dresses. I am now coming into Morriston. There are lots of roads; they remind me of grey ribbons twisting and turning all over the place. The cars look like coloured insects on wheels. I can now see the DVLC. The building looks very smart standing in the middle of all the grey ribbons. There are lots of people going in and out. I am now over Ynystawe School. The children are in lines walking into their classrooms,like rows of ants marching.
